name: Dynamics Data Fetcher Agent (Mock DB)
description: Fetches mock Account, Contact, Opportunity, and Case data for a given Account ID from a PostgreSQL database.

authSchemes.description: No authentication required for this agent.

skills.name: Get Dynamics Account Data
skills.description: Retrieves related Account, Contact, Opportunity, and Case records from the mock database.

account_id.description: The Account GUID (e.g., ACC-GUID-001) to fetch data for.

dynamics_data.description: A dictionary containing fetched account, contacts, opportunities, and cases.
